forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 46. West northwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 60. Northwest wind 3 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
The night settles softly over Downtown San Francisco, with a clear sky presiding over the city. The air feels crisp, and a gentle breeze whispers through the streets, its coolness hinting at the beauty of the day ahead. As dawn approaches, the world awakens to a promise of bright sunlight and clear vistas. Today's forecast suggests a sunny embrace, perfect for exploring the overlooked corners of this enchanting city.

With maximum temperatures hovering around a comfortable 60 degrees, daylight promises warmth, yet the chill of early hours lingers, nudging one towards a light jacket or a cozy sweater. As the sun rises, it will banish any trace of fog—today’s views will be unobstructed, revealing the stark outlines of the landscape against a cerulean sky. The absence of the marine layer affords a nearly perfect canvas, inviting every passerby to venture out. A walk across the Golden Gate Bridge might reveal the city’s beauty in new light, or perhaps an afternoon spent at a local café would be an indulgent way to bask in the day. Whatever the choice, this weather brings with it the gentle reminders of a day well-spent.
